title: Kōnan, Kōchi
text:
is a <a href="Cities%20of%20Japan">city</a> located in <a href="K%C5%8Dchi%20Prefecture">Kōchi Prefecture</a>, <a href="Japan">Japan</a>. , the city has an estimated <a href="population">population</a> of 32,786 and a <a href="population%20density">population density</a> of 260 persons per km². The total area is 126.75 km².
The modern city of Kōnan was established on March 1, 2006, from the merger of the towns of <a href="Akaoka%2C%20K%C5%8Dchi">Akaoka</a>, <a href="Kagami%2C%20K%C5%8Dchi%20%28Kami%29">Kagami</a>, <a href="Noichi%2C%20K%C5%8Dchi">Noichi</a> and <a href="Yasu%2C%20K%C5%8Dchi">Yasu</a>, and the village of <a href="Yoshikawa%2C%20K%C5%8Dchi">Yoshikawa</a> (all from <a href="Kami%20District%2C%20K%C5%8Dchi">Kami District</a>), which was dissolved as a result of this merger and the merger on the same day that created the new city of <a href="Kami%2C%20K%C5%8Dchi">Kami</a>.
